description: I was walking around a shopping mall when I met a super cute blond boy. I pretended to be just an ordinary guy working on a survey and the guy bought that stupid pretext. I immediately noticed he wasn´t camera shy at all. That is always a good sign. I went for the kill right away and asked him to show me some skin in exchange for a nice pay. He even agreed to do it at the restroom that is in the mall. The place was packed with people so we had to be very quiet and careful. Especially when he started sucking me off. It´s a weird experience to have a cock sucked while there is a guy dumping right in the next stall. We had so much fun that I gave him all my money for following me somewhere more discreet. There is a jacuzzi place at the mall so I knew exactly where to go.
title: Czech Hunter 340
